title: Come to Riot's GD

embed.description: Culture This is the wild wild west. Unlike the rest of the boards, anything goes. That is, unless it violates the Universal Rules. HAVE FUN KTHXBAI. Etiquette Follow the Universal Rules or you will suffer the consequences.

body:
It may be located in NA instead of OCE, but at least you can use your OCE account instead of needing to level up a smurf.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI

replies.body:
Id rather not join in with a server that completely hates us for no reason.

Not even joking. They hate oce

> Id rather not join in with a server that completely hates us for no reason.
> 
> Not even joking. They hate oce

There are many people from OCE that post in the NA boards, so I have no idea where you're getting that assumption from.

Not to mention that I have not once in my life seen a non-OCE bash an OCE user just for being from OCE.

> LOL. u are joking right,,

I found the reason why you are so anti-NA boards. Apparently you aren't exactly the nicest person, and have done some troll stuff to make even OCE people angry.

http://puu.sh/d7BqP.jpg

> umad

Those from NA don't hate us people from OCE, they just hate you because you act like an immature child.

> > umad
> 
> Those from NA don't hate us people from OCE, they just hate you because you act like an immature child.

Molendo is life though?

> LOL. u are joking right,,

Of course not. I've been using the NA forums for a long time before they were archived and nobody was ever hostile to any OCE guys, though granted there wasn't a whole lot of them there.

Once the new boards were created, people from OCE, EUW, and EUNE all came to NA's boards. I haven't seen any discrimination and "internet fights" happen between people just because someone was from a region other than NA.
Why would they hate us? Only hatred they would have is for the non-existent middle eastern server.
so fkn true tho, Riot has no presence here.

Well anyway, https://www.facebook.com/DecodeEsports?fref=ts

We are New Zealand's first Esports organization, with our mission to promote and support NZ players and the Oceanic scne as a whole. We want to promote professionalism and competitiveness on an international level by being the face of NZ/OCE Esports.
 Like follow 
OH AND ALSO OUR TWITTER! 

https://twitter.com/@DecodeEsports
